page.title: 01Living in Rowney Green,
page.content: The people mainly say there is a good community life, except for the younger people who have just moved in. This is because of a sort of rift between the inhabitants of the village. The ones who have lived for 27-45 years, since housing was cheap, are very involved in community life, but the people who have only lived there for 3 monhs to 3 years take no part because all their friends, jobs etc are in the towns. They only have their houses in the village. Apart from that there is the village council and W I comittees etc.
